channel.title: The Note on Anti-Suicide Project
channel.description: Recent content in The Note on Anti-Suicide Project

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hoi, my name is Pixel, and I spent a long time creating this because I care about you and I don’t want you to end your life. You are important. When reading this, I want you to imagine I’m there saying it to you in person. This was created by someone who can relate. Due to my disabilities, my emotions are stronger than most other peopleâ€™s. I have been through this since I was eight, and I am still here.
